channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- OpenBMC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- OpenBMC

item.title: CVE-2024-35124|2024-08-13T11:14:40.227Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: A vulnerability in the combination of the OpenBMC's FW1050.00 through FW1050.10, FW1030.00 through FW1030.50, and FW1020.00 through FW1020.60 default password and session management allow an attacker to gain administrative access to the BMC. IBM X-Force ID: 290674.

item.title: CVE-2024-31916|2024-07-03T19:40:31.697Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.

item.title: CVE-2024-31916|2024-06-27T17:45:31.618Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.

item.title: CVE-2024-31916|2024-08-02T01:59:50.705Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.
